inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and recent coinfection with HBV

inclusion.criterion: study visit schedule and protocol requirements
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pregnant or planning to become pregnant
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: decompensated liver disease or symptoms/signs of decompensation

notes: The patient has a history of HCV and recent coinfection with HBV. He is on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.
